description:
Create Synchronicity is an easy, fast and powerful backup application. It synchronizes files and folders, has a neat interface, and can schedule backups to keep your data safe. Plus, it's open source, portable, multilingual, and very lightweight.

[Features](http://synchronicity.sourceforge.net/features.html)
[Screenshots](http://synchronicity.sourceforge.net/screenshots.html)
[FAQ](http://synchronicity.sourceforge.net/faq.html)
[Manual](http://synchronicity.sourceforge.net/help.html)
summary: Easy, fast, and lightweight backup and synchronization
author: Clément Pit--Claudel
